ygData.subject: RE: remove me from the list please
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I will add that, but I ll tell ya, the reason I don t just link to it on the uploads is because I ve found that people seldom visit the links for FAQs,
ygData.messageBody:
At 03:10 PM 10/13/99 -0400, you wrote:
>From: Lonnie Lewis <LLewis@...>
>
> Maybe we should put the answer to this in the FAQ? Also, can you
>put the FAQ in a directory at onelist? That way you don't have to send out
>the entire FAQ every week, just send the link.

I will add that, but I'll tell ya, the reason I don't just link to it on
the uploads is because I've found that people seldom visit the links for
FAQs, whereas if you put it in front of their faces, they are more likely
to read it.

Talies
